credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Frame for a papal inscription
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. A tablet with two circular arcs above and an angular broken edge below is in front of the crossed papal keys from which a tassel hangs on either side; two crossed branches below. Below the arcs are medallions, the left one with a bust portrait. Usual background.
name: Drawing
